title: New: Wooing – In Colour
content:
Wooing’s debut track In Colour is a bewildering and exciting psych rock anthem.

The band led by Rachel Trachtenburg of Trachtenburg Family Slideshow Players and Supercute! fame begin the song with a very sparse almost melancholic dream pop intro before taking it up a serious gear. All of a sudden the rest of the band come in and Rachel’s echoed vocals hover in and around stern drum drums and a fierce distorted guitar that gives In Colour a real heavy bite. This is a fantastic introduction to Wooing with their EP DayDream Time Machine a must to look out for in May.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d31
